body_html:
You see, there are a lot of questions about tensorflow in stackoverflow, not solved.

You are right, GraphDef is a member of MetaGraphDef. what I am concern is:

  • the difference between my-model-10000.meta and graph.pb?
  • the difference between export_meta_graph and write_graph?
    • their content is different slightly
    • freeze graph not work in export_meta_graph

All the above are MetaGraphDef.

body:
You see, there are a lot of questions about tensorflow in stackoverflow, **not solved**.

You are right, GraphDef is a member of MetaGraphDef. what I am concern is:
-  the difference between `my-model-10000.meta` and `graph.pb`?
- the difference between `export_meta_graph` and `write_graph`?  
    - their content is different slightly
    - freeze graph not work in `export_meta_graph`

 All the above are MetaGraphDef.
